## isNumber() function

`n`이 Number이면 true를 반환합니다.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isNumber: <T>(input: T) => input is T & number
```

## Example

```ts
isNumber(2); // true
isNumber("a"); // false
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/isNumber.ts)
